# hasRemappedElements

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the user remaps elements in this profile.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasRemappedElements: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the user remaps one or more elements; otherwise, this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Remapping input elements

- **mappedElementAlias(forPhysicalInputName:)**: Returns the name of the input element to which the user remaps the given physical element.
- **mappedPhysicalInputNames(forElementAlias:)**: Returns the physical input elements to which the user remaps the given input element.
- **GCControllerUserCustomizationsDidChange**: A notification that posts when the user customizes the button mappings or other settings of a controller.
